results.name: Partial sums of A165581.
comment: Period 524287. The largest value 658 occurs in four positions: a(184560) = a(184562) = a(339724) = a(339726) = 658. Note that a(262143) = 255 and a(174762) = a(349524) = 510. (Cf. to A165477 and see comments at A165479).
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..524287
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 22 2009
